flawed_nl_solution:
He consumes 2500+1000=<<2500+1000=5300>>5300 calories on Saturday
He consumes 2500*6+5300=<<2500*6+5300=20300>>20300 calories in the week.
He burns 3000*7=<<3000*7=21000>>21000 calories in the week
His caloric deficit is 21000-20300=<<21000-20300=700>>700 calories per week
#### 700

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3500, not 5300. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
